direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: takes a step and immediately a stone breaks away and INDY falls up to his hip -- his leg stuck through the hold where the stone once was.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: reacts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh dear!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: who grunts as he pulls himself from the hole, the v-rail Diary in his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In Latin, "Jehovah" starts with an "I." "I"... Now we SEE each letter on the stones as INDY carefully walks forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and ELSA follow in his footsteps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: sighs with relief and steps forward to:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stands in a small opening, just small enough for his shoulders to squeeze through and beyond that a 100 foot drop to the rocks below and 100 feet across, nothing but a rough, stony cliff wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He can see nowhere to cross. He looks again to the v-rail Diary.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "The path of flood. Only in the leap from the lion's head will he prove his worth."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: looks around and then he notices that inscribed into the rock above his head is the head of a lion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Impossiblel Nobody can jump this!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: looks down into the Diary and tortures over what it is asking him to do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: rushes forward and calls to INDY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Indy... Indy, you must hurry!! Come quickly!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (realizing) It's... a leap of faith. Oh, God.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: calls to his son.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You must believe, boy. you must... believe. We see him do it. We see him leap into space. We see that he is in midair. We see that he is not going to make it. His hands claw for the opposite wall but he is going to fall 100 feet to his death. And thenhe doesn't! He appears to be held up by thin air as he lands on his hands and knees.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: looks around and down and now he figures it out. Ingeniously, the First Crusaders have painted a pathway to align with the rocks
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: feet below. It is a perfect forced perspective image of the rocks below with lines from a hundred feet continuing six feet below his sight line where his feet are stepping. It's painted to blend in with the rocks below. Highly evolved camouflage... in perfect alignment with everything we see below. When INDY leans out to the left or right... that's when he sees the perfect alignment shift that betrays the trick. Indy throws some dirt on the bridge and he crosses it like the first Crusader from the painting over Henry's desk. Indy crawls through a small opening in the side of the cliff and enters a Temple. A vast array of chalices is displayed on the altar of this small Temple. Perhaps a hundred or more. Many sizes, many shapes, some gold, some silver, but they all glitter and shine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is mesmerized by their number and their beauty. And then he realizes that a man is praying at the altarl He has his back turned to INDY... but he is dressed as what he is! A GRAIL KNIGHT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But we can't see the Grail Knight's face. The visor of his helmet is down. Perhaps we see his eyes. CONTINUED: When the GRAIL KNIGHT sees INDY he gets wearily to his feet and, surprisingly, prepares to give combat...taking up his two-handed broadsword...he comes at Indy, attempting to swing the huge, heavy sword but finding the effort almost too much. Indy dodges two or three clumsy swings of the sword, making no attempt to fight back...until the Knight, exhausted, drops the sword and collapses. Indy approaches him and raises the visor and we see that the Knight is a very ancient man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I knew you'd come, but my strength has left me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The last of three brothers who swore an oath to find the Grail and to guard it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was seven hundred years ago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A long time to wait. The GRAIL KNIGHT reaches forward and fingers Indy's clothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're strangely dressed...for a knight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not exactly...a knight. What do you mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was chosen because I was the bravest and the most worthy. The honor was mine until another came to challenge me to single combat. I pass it to you who vanquished me. The GRAIL KNIGHT holds his sword out to INDY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen, I don't have time to explain, but At that moment DONOVAN and ELSA appear. Donovan turns to face the display of cups.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which one is it? CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You must choose. (beat) But choose wisely. For as the True Grail will bring you life the False Grail will take it from you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not a historian. I have no idea what it looks like. Which one is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me choose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, Doctor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and INDY exchange looks. He thinks he is seeing her in her true colors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: chooses a cupa solid gold, emerald encrusted goblet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: instantly takes it from her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yes. It's more beautiful than I'd ever imagined. This certainly is the cup of the King of Kings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: rushes to the well and fills the goblet with water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eternal life!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: drinks from the goblet. Then, DONOVAN'S entire body starts to convulse. His face contorts in agony. He grabs his stomach and turns toward ELSA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What . . . is . . . happening. . . to . . . me. . .? He starts to agefast! His hair grows long and gray and brittle. His face sinks. Fingernails curl back on themselves. Milky cataracts coat his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: gasps and screams.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What. . . is . . . happening. . . ? His skin turns brown and leathery and stretches across his bones until it splits. His skeletal hands reach for ELSA's throat, choking her. CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: rushes forward and pushes DONOVAN away. As he falls he BODY BREAKS INTO FLAMES, then SHATTERS AGAINST THE WALL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He chose...poorly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: studies the array of chalices.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It would not be made out of gold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: picks up another cupa simple earthenware jug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's the cup of a carpenter. He and ELSA exchange a look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's only one way to find out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: goes to the well and fills the earthenware jug with water, then pauses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: brings the jug to his lips and takes several large swallows. A strange sensation overcomes him, a feeling of peace and contentment...and we see his wounds begin to heal.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: You have chosen wisely. But the Grail cannot pass beyond the Great Seal. That is the boundary and the price of immortality.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: who attend to Henry awaiting Indy's return.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and ELSA come forward with the Grail. The TWO NAZI SOLDIERS are over-awed by the possessors of the Grail. They put down their guns and kneel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: kneels by HENRY's side and tilts his head forward and holds the Grail to his lips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is too weak to even open his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: swallows some of the water. Much of it runs down the corners of his mouth. Finally INDY pours the water over the wound and everyone watches in astonishment as the wound and the blood stain disappear before their eyes. The color returns to Henry's face. HENRY's eyes open. The first thing he sees is the Grail and they light up. Then they shift to INDY's faceand they light up even more...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: run forward. SALLAH points a rifle at them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drop your guns. Please. The NAZI SOLDIERS drop their weapons at their feet and raise their arms in surrender.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad, come on. Get to your feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: steps forward and picks up the Grail. She turns to INDY, her face alight with possession of the Grail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have got it. Come on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: steps onto the edge of the Great Seal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa! Elsa, don't movel
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's ours, Indy. Yours and mine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa, don't cross the Seal. The Knight warned us not to take the Grail from here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and the ground roars and shifts. Dirt falls from the ceiling of the cavern. ELSA falls on the Great Seal. The Grail bounces away from her grasp. She reaches for it and the ground beneath her begins to SPLIT OPEN. ELSA slips into the crevasse. She screams.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is hanging perilously in the abyss, with the Grail almost within her reach. As her hands lose their grip, INDY just manages to one of them, he himself sliding forward across the slanted floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Junior!  Junior! With her free hand, ELSA is trying to get the Grail. INDY can't save her unless she gives him her free hand. She has to choose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa. Elsa don't. Elsa. Elsa. Give me your other hand, honey. I can't hold you. CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can reach it. I can reach it... Her hand begins to slip from Indy's grasp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa! Give me your hand. Give me your other hand!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: just manages to touch the Grail. In doing so, she has tipped the balance too farINDY slides down another yard, Elsa loses her grip and falls screaming to her death.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa!! Now the ledge INDY lies upon begins to break apart. HENRY grabs one of his hands as Indy struggles to reach the Grail with the other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Junior, give me your other hand! I can't hold on!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can get itI can almost reach it, Dad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: looks down into the black bottomless pit beneath him from which nothing can ever be retrieved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Indiana. Indiana!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: snaps his look up to his father. His father has never called him this before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... let it go...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: abandons the Grail and grabs onto HENRY with both hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: pulls him up to safety.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: looks through the falling debris to INDY and HENRY. SALLAH and BRODY rush from the crumbling Temple.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad. . . The GRAIL KNIGHT raises his arm to HENRY. CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, Dad...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and HENRY down the passageway just as a huge stone column tumbles down upon the spot where they stood. The GRAIL KNIGHT lowers his arm as he watches them leave.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: ROAR OF WALLS CAVING IN IS HEARD

direction.raw_text: and BRODY emerge from the Mountain Temple through the Grecian Facade. From within the Mountain Temple, the ROAR OF WALLS CAVING IN IS HEARD. A cloud of dust and smoke billows out from the entrance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: turns to INDY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa never really believed in the Grail. She thought she'd found a prize.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did vou find, Dad?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me?... Illumination.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and INDY mount their horses. Henry turns back to his son.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did you find, Junior?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Junior?! Dad...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please...What does it always mean, this...this "Junior?"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's his name. Henry Jones, Junior.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I like Indiana.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We named the dog Indiana.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: May we go home now, please? CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The dog!? (laughs) You are named after the dog...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got a lot of fond memories of that dog. A moment passes as they all ready their mounts and SALLAH continues to laugh at INDY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ready?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ready.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Indy! Henryl Follow met I know the way! (to his horse) Haaa!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Got lost in his own museum, huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-huh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After you, Junior.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir! (to his horse) Haaa!
